ja.highPressureDesc: 外壁・床面の頑固な汚れを強力除去
ja.highPressureLongDesc: 最新鋭の高圧洗浄機を使用し、外壁、駐車場、ベランダ等の汚れを根本から除去。新築のような輝きを取り戻します。
ja.highPressureFeatures: 建造物外壁,コンクリート床,タイル・石材,屋根・雨どい
ja.tileCleaning: タイル洗浄 & コーティング
ja.tileCleaningDesc: タイルの美観回復と防汚コーティング
ja.tileCleaningLongDesc: 特殊洗剤と専用機器でタイルの黒ずみや水垢を除去。さらに防汚・防カビコーティングで美しさを長期間維持します。
ja.tileCleaningFeatures: 床・壁タイル,浴室・キッチン,エントランス,防汚コーティング
ja.carpetCleaning: 特殊カーペットクリーニング
ja.carpetCleaningDesc: 繊維の奥から汚れを除去、消臭・除菌も
ja.carpetCleaningLongDesc: 先進のカーペット洗浄システムで、深層の汚れ、シミ、臭いを徹底除去。アレルギー対策にも効果的です。
ja.carpetCleaningFeatures: オフィス・店舗,ホテル・住宅,シミ抜き・消臭,アレルゲン除去

ja.featuresDescription: 確かな技術と経験豊富なスタッフによる、JT Cleaning Serviceの価値あるサービス。
ja.specialEquipmentDesc: 業務用高性能清掃機器と専用洗剤を使用。効率的かつ高品質な清掃を実現します。
ja.thoroughSanitizationDesc: 環境と人体に安全な専用洗浄剤を使用。目に見えない菌も確実に除去し、衛生的な空間を提供します。
ja.quickResponseDesc: 平日・休日問わず受付。お客様のご要望に迅速に対応できる体制を整えています。
ja.fairPricingDesc: 無駄を排除した効率的な作業で、高品質なサービスを適正価格でご提供します。
ja.securityGuaranteeDesc: 損害保険完備。作業後の品質にご満足いただけない場合は、無償で再対応いたします。
ja.attentiveSupportDesc: お客様ごとに担当者を配置し、ご要望に合わせた最適なプランと丁寧なサービスを提供します。
ja.titlePrefix: プロフェッショナルな
ja.heroDescriptionLine1: 最新の技術と熟練の技で、
ja.heroDescriptionLine2: あらゆる空間を清潔で快適な環境に

ja.highPressureShortDesc: 外壁・駐車場の汚れを徹底洗浄
ja.tileCleaningShortDesc: 美観を復元し清潔な空間に
ja.servicesDescription: 多様なニーズに応える、プロフェッショナル清掃ソリューション。
ja.inquireAboutService: このサービスについて問い合わせる
ja.newsletterDescription: お得な情報や最新の清掃技術についてお知らせします。
ja.companyDescription: 最先端技術と熟練の技で、あらゆる空間をクリーンに。お客様の快適な環境づくりをサポートします。
ja.siteTitle: JT プロフェッショナルクリーニングサービス
ja.siteDescription: 最新の技術と熟練の技で、あらゆる空間を清潔で快適な環境に。プロフェッショナルな清掃サービスを提供します。

en.contactDescription: Feel free to contact us with any questions or service requests.
en.contactResponse: Our staff will respond within 24 hours.
en.name: Name or Company
en.supportedFiles: Supported files: JPEG, PNG, PDF, Excel, Word, Text, etc.
en.success: Your inquiry has been received. Our staff will contact you within 24 hours.
en.highPressureDesc: Powerful removal of stubborn dirt from walls and floors
en.highPressureLongDesc: Using state-of-the-art high-pressure cleaning equipment to remove dirt from exteriors, parking lots, and balconies from the root. Restore the shine like new construction.
en.tileCleaningDesc: Restore tile appearance with anti-stain coating
en.tileCleaningLongDesc: Special detergents and dedicated equipment remove blackening and water stains from tiles. Additionally, anti-stain and anti-mold coating maintains beauty for a long time.
en.carpetCleaningDesc: Deep dirt removal with deodorizing and sanitizing
en.carpetCleaningLongDesc: Advanced carpet cleaning system thoroughly removes deep dirt, stains, and odors. Also effective for allergy prevention.
en.carpetCleaningFeatures: Offices & stores,Hotels & residences,Stain & odor removal,Allergen removal
en.fileCountError: You can attach up to {MAX_FILES} files.
en.fileSizeError: Total attachment size must be under {MAX_TOTAL_SIZE_MB}MB. (Current: {currentSize})
en.copyright: © 2023 JT Professional Cleaning Service. All Rights Reserved.
en.featuresDescription: Valuable services by JT Cleaning Service with proven technology and experienced staff.
en.specialEquipmentDesc: Using high-performance commercial cleaning equipment and specialized detergents for efficient and high-quality cleaning.
en.thoroughSanitizationDesc: Using cleaning agents that are safe for the environment and people, removing invisible bacteria for a hygienic space.
en.quickResponseDesc: Accepting orders on weekdays and holidays. We have a system in place to respond quickly to customer requests.
en.fairPricingDesc: We provide high-quality service at a fair price through efficient work that eliminates waste.
en.securityGuaranteeDesc: Liability insurance available. If you are not satisfied with the quality of our work, we will re-service at no charge.
en.attentiveSupportDesc: We assign a dedicated staff member to each customer to provide the optimal plan and attentive service based on your needs.
en.heroDescriptionLine1: With the latest technology and experienced expertise,
en.heroDescriptionLine2: we create clean and comfortable environments for any space.
en.carpetCleaningShortDesc: Removing stubborn stains with advanced technology
en.highPressureShortDesc: Thorough cleaning of exteriors and parking areas
en.tileCleaningShortDesc: Restoring beauty for a clean space
en.servicesDescription: Professional cleaning solutions that meet diverse needs.
en.newsletterDescription: Stay updated with the latest cleaning technologies and special offers.
en.companyDescription: With cutting-edge technology and skilled expertise, we clean every space. Supporting comfortable environments for our customers.
en.siteDescription: With the latest technology and skilled expertise, we create clean and comfortable environments for any space. Professional cleaning services at your service.
